entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
